mapper.update: update customer_integral_records set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, types = #{types,jdbcType=TINYINT}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_type = #{targetType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, customer_id, types, quantity, target_id, target_type, created_at, updated_at, description from customer_integral_records where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
